client.name: National Council of Chartered Accountants and Accounting Experts
client.description: The CNDCEC is an italian institution that acts as the interlocutor between the accountants, and therefore businesses, and the Minisitry of Economy and Finance.

description: I led the design of the application and the development of its frontend side.
The application allows the Board of the Council to monitor the progress of commissioned researches, that are going to be presented to the Minisitry of Economy and Finance.
